title: bye

description.plain:
“bye” she sings about the negative while also highlighting positive things, and finally putting an end to the relationship. The single is the second track on her seventh studio album, eternal sunshine

That was a tricky balance for me because I definitely had some sessions where I was writing more emotionally and reactively but that’s also very human so I didn’t want to erase all of it,"

—via Amazon Music

embed_content: Read “bye” by Ariana Grande on Genius
recording_location: Jungle Studios (New York, NY), MXM Studios (Stockholm, SE), Studio 12 (Jonstorp, SE) and Decoy Studios (Suffolk, UK)

album.full_title: eternal sunshine deluxe: brighter days ahead (instrumental version) by Ariana Grande
album.name: eternal sunshine deluxe: brighter days ahead (instrumental version)
